name: Source of Survival
description:
An interesting survival game, where player survives in an island full of zombies and prehistoric creatures such as dinosaurs. Find food, cut trees build a shelter and survive.

features


  • Eat, Plant and Collect Wood and Build a place to live.
  • Collect weapons, find ammo and kill anyone who crosses the line.
  • Find necessary tools to cut trees.
  • Beautiful yet hostile world to explore.
